parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to serious injury or death in the event of a crash, as the airbags may not deploy properly or at all.
symptoms: The airbag light on the dashboard is illuminated
the airbag system is malfunctioning
the passenger seat occupant detection mat is faulty
and the seatbelt light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inconvenience and Frustration with Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of available parts and remedy for the recalls can cause inconvenience and frustration for vehicle owners, leaving them without a safe and reliable vehicle.
symptoms: The dealership does not have available parts for the recall repairs
the manufacturer does not provide a timeline for the remedy
and the vehicle owner is left without a safe and reliable vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can lead to accidents and injuries, as the brakes may not function properly.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brakes are not functioning properly
and the emergency parking brake is not working.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate, jerk, or lunge forward, making it difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission hesitates or fails to respond to throttle input
jerks or lunges forward
harsh downshifting
difficulty shifting into gear
and loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage, stalling, or complete failure, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The coolant level warning light comes on
coolant is leaking from the front right side of the engine
and the engine overheats.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the eccentric shaft sensor can cause the engine to stall or hesitate, making it difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine cuts off and on
and the EML warning indicator light comes on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the set positioning motor can cause the vehicle to become disabled without warning, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
and various warning indicators come on
including the 4x4 malfunction
ABS brake failure
and transmission malfunction lights.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heated seat can cause burns, fires, and damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The seat heater overheats
burns
or catches fire
causing a burning smell
smoke
and damage to the seat and surrounding areas.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Recall Issues and Poor Customer Service
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of BMW to properly address recall issues and provide adequate customer service can lead to safety risks and frustration for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Vehicle owners experience difficulties in getting their vehicles repaired under recall
are not informed about recalls
or are not provided with adequate solutions to safety issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause fires, damage to the vehicle, and safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences electrical system failures
including wiring insulation cracking
shorts
and fires
which can cause damage to the vehicle and pose safety risks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine and transmission issues can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, and experience other safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences engine and transmission issues
including stalling
loss of power
and warning lights illuminating on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heated seat can cause burns, fires, and injuries to the driver or passengers, which can lead to accidents or other safety risks.
symptoms: The seat heater emits a burning smell
the seat becomes excessively hot
smoke is visible
the seat material is burned or melted
and the driver or passenger may experience burns or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat occupant detection mat can cause the front passenger airbags to malfunction, which can lead to injuries or fatalities in the event of a crash.
symptoms: The airbag warning light is illuminated
the passenger seat occupant detection mat is faulty
and the airbags may not deploy in a crash.
